short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a random XKCD comic every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your new tab with a random XKCD comic. Clicking on comic takes you to the ExplainXKCD page for it, 'cuz face it, you probably needed it.

Goodbye productivity.

Icon credits: Plainicon from www.flaticon.com. Content credits: Randall Munroe.
